::KitKat:;

She yawned and went back to her corner and curled up.  She hoped that 
her oriiginal leg was in good enough condition to reattach. But if 
not, Drillbit had a new one for her.  She felt happy to know that she 
had such good friends around her.  She smiled. She closed her eyes 
and fell asleep again.
